trans-unit.source: Represents the statement of a <xref href="System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup"></xref> describing the permissions and other information that apply to code with a particular set of evidence.
trans-unit.target: Representerer uttrykket i en <xref href="System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup"> </xref> som beskriver tillatelsene og annen informasjon som gjelder code med et bestemt sett bevis.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: A PolicyStatement consists of a set of granted permissions, and possible special attributes for the code group.
trans-unit.target: En PolicyStatement består av et sett med gitt tillatelse og mulige spesielle attributter for kode-gruppen.

trans-unit.source: Policy statements are typically used as the return value of a <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel.Resolve%2A> operation on a <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel>.
trans-unit.target: Policyen setninger brukes som returverdi av en <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel.Resolve%2A>operasjon på en <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel>.</xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel> </xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel.Resolve%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement"> </xref> klassen med den angitte <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> with which to initialize the new instance.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> som ikke den nye forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> and attributes.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement"> </xref> klassen med den angitte <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> og attributter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> with which to initialize the new instance.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> som ikke den nye forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatementAttribute"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av det <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatementAttribute"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the attributes of the policy statement.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir attributtene i policy-setningen.

trans-unit.source: The attributes of the policy statement.
trans-unit.target: Attributter for policyen-setningen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string representation of the attributes of the policy statement.
trans-unit.target: Henter en strengrepresentasjon av attributtene i policy-setningen.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to get a text string of the attributes currently set for the <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å få en tekststreng med attributter som er angitt for <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement>.</xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement>

trans-unit.source: A text string representing the attributes of the policy statement.
trans-unit.target: En tekststreng som representerer attributtene i policy-setningen.

trans-unit.source: Creates an equivalent copy of the current policy statement.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en tilsvarende kopi av gjeldende policy-setning.

trans-unit.source: A new copy of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement"></xref> with <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement.PermissionSet*> and <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement.Attributes*> identical to those of the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En ny kopi av det <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement"> </xref> med <> </> *> og <> </> *> identisk med de gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement"></xref> object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den angitte <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement"> </xref> objektet som er lik gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement"></xref> object to compare with the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement"> </xref> objektet skal sammenlignes med gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement"></xref> object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den angitte <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement"> </xref> er lik gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement"> </xref> objekt; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a given state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: Rekonstruerer et sikkerhetsobjekt med en gitt tilstand fra en XML-koding.

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: XML-koding til å bruke Bygg opp sikkerhetsobjektet.

trans-unit.source: The et parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The et parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The et parameter is not a valid encoding.
trans-unit.target: Den et parameteren er ikke en gyldig koding.

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a given state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: Rekonstruerer et sikkerhetsobjekt med en gitt tilstand fra en XML-koding.

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: XML-koding til å bruke Bygg opp sikkerhetsobjektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel"></xref> context for lookup of <xref href="System.Security.NamedPermissionSet"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel"> </xref> kontekst for oppslag for <xref href="System.Security.NamedPermissionSet"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The et parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The et parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The et parameter is not a valid encoding.
trans-unit.target: Den et parameteren er ikke en gyldig koding.

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash code for the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement"></xref> object that is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: Henter en hash-kode for den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement"> </xref> objektet som passer for bruk i nummer algoritmer og data strukturer som en hash-tabell.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for two instances of the same permission might be different, hence a hash code should not be used to compare two <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement> objects.
trans-unit.target: Hash-kode for to forekomster av samme tillatelse kan være forskjellig, en hash-kode må derfor ikke brukes til å sammenligne to <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement>objekter.</xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement>

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En hash-kode for gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> of the policy statement.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> av policy-setning.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> of the policy statement.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> av policy-setning.

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en XML-koding sikkerhet og den gjeldende tilstanden.

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: XML-koding av sikkerhetsobjekt, inkludert tilstandsinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en XML-koding sikkerhet og den gjeldende tilstanden.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel"></xref> context for lookup of <xref href="System.Security.NamedPermissionSet"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel"> </xref> kontekst for oppslag for <xref href="System.Security.NamedPermissionSet"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: XML-koding av sikkerhetsobjekt, inkludert tilstandsinformasjon.
